item.title: Web Applications WS2019/2020 - Tentative Schedule
item.description: Tentative - this will still be changed and adapted. Tentative Schedule Week KW Date What Who Homework / Due Tue 22:00 next week 1 41 Thu 10/10/2019 Class Intro BK Homework 0 2 42 Thu 17/10/2019 User Story Mapping & First Project BK 3 43 Thu 24/10/2019 Paper Prototypes / Storyboards BK 4 44 Thu 31/10/2019 e-learning 5 45 Thu 07/11/2019 Patterns of Enterprise Application Architectures BK Continuous Deployment BK 6 46 Thu 14/11/2019 Gemeinsamer Besuch des World Usability Days - bitte anmelden!
